Package edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Entity
    This interface represents an entity on the grid.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    This class keeps track of all the sprites that make up the dispaly such as lives,ammo,invuln,and if a room is empty or not.
    EmptySpace
    This class represents an empty space on the grid.
    EntityMovement
    This class represents movement on the grid.
    ExtraBullet
    This class represents an extra bullet powerup.
    GameEngine
    This class represents an instance of the game.
    GameEngineGUI
    This class represents an instance of the game.
    Grid
    This class creates the grid that the keeps track of all game entities.
    GUI
    This class creates the window on which the game is to be played and creates the window the player inputs save/loading from.
    GUIEntity
    This class creates the sprite and saves the sprites location on the screen.
    Invulnerability
    This class represents an invulnerability powerup.
    Menu
    This method keeps track of all of menu sprites used during the main menu and pause menu.
    Ninja
    This class represents a ninja in the game.
    NinjaSprite
    This class keeps track of all ninja to be drawn to the screen.
    Player
    This class represents the player.
    PlayerSprite
    This class keeps track of the player sprite and what direction they are face as well as draws them to the screen.
    PowerUp
    This class represents a powerup on the grid.
    PowerUpSprite
    This class keeps track of the location and draws the three power ups to the screen.
    Radar
    This class represents a radar powerup.
    Room
    This class represents a room in the grid.
    RoomSprite
    This class keeps track of all of the rooms and document rooms that need to be drawn to screen.
    Shadow
    This class creates the animated shadow used in GUI.
    Sprite
    This class keeps track of sprites location on the board and drawns them to the screen.
    SpriteLoader
    This Class Loads sprite in to graphics and stores them to be used when drawn to the screen
    SpyVsNinja
    This class is used to run the game Spy Vs.
    UserInterface
    This class represents the user interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SpyVsNinja.EntityDirec
    This enum allows for easy reference to the direction of the player.
    SpyVsNinja.playerAct
    This enum allows for easy access to possible player action for the user.
